name: Crate Challenge 3D
description:
This Game was built by me [ballomizzy] for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2 in 1 week.

You guessed it right, the #cratechallenge has a game now, for a virtual experience. I challenge you to climb in and play, don't climb the crates for real though.

It is as simple as the word "simple", hit the spacebar to step to the next milk-crate, (and the arrow keys to balance), and proceed on time to avoid been stoned to death  the ground by your chaotic crowd. Hop on in! It is totally fun to experience the fails virtually!

"The Game is Not Fully Functional Yet, But the Main Features have been Implemented", I'll try my best to add all features after the jam! Have fun!

Mobile version coming soon (tilting device to balance).

Code, Development, Sfx by me [ballomizzy]

Music: Childish Theme Loop 2.wav by Mrthenoronha

Models by SYNTY STUDIOS

If you really appreciate the game, you can follow me to get more updates:

www.instagram.com/ballomizzy or www.instagram.com/mike.gdev 

And also consider subscribing to my YT to watch how I made the game (in three days inside a cave, lololol)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeN8B9-Hp33c545sIOlQ8bQ
